text: st BirthdayWelp  turning   in a little less than   weeks  I ve told myself since my early teenage years that if things weren t better by then that I would pull the plug  I had numerous instances where I came close  where I thought my mind was made up   The girl I fell in love with was the only one who could understand and help me  yet I had to walk away from her because she could not return my feelings  It was simply too hard to keep her around  despite the fact that we were mutually best friends  Now here I sit  no friends  no support system  living in literal agony I m bi polar and have terrible anxiety  I can hardly speak aloud in class without coming to the edge of a panic attack  I scream in my car when I m alone on the freeway  There s so much built up agony and I have no way to resolve any of my issues  I take medicine  I see a psychiatrist and a therapist  None of this has changed the fact that I hate myself and have nothing to fill my heart   I ve been in love  but have never been loved  Not on a romantic level  I m unable to discuss these things with my family as I m ridiculed for  being selfish  It s hard  I want to kill myself but my dad is already dying as it is  He has   years at the most and to take my own life while he s on the brink would only make matters worse I m just so sick of being guilted out of it  Nobody understands the pain  Life is hell  I wish to end it  I just need to push through the guilt and worry about my own pain
summary: It's St. st's birthday in a little less than weeks. He's bi polar and has terrible anxiety and panic attacks. He has been in love but has never been loved. He takes medicine and sees a psychiatrist and a therapist. He wants to kill himself, but his dad is ill.
